name: TMP - Increase Tab Progress Bar Height
description: This style will increase the height of the tab progress bar, modify its color, and remove the progress throbber from normal tabs.
additional_info:
Requires Tab Mix Plus (TMP) - https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/tab-mix-plus/
May not work with dev bulds of TMP. 
May not work when using Minefield in conjunction with any build of TMP
Tested in Firefox 4(official)using default theme with TMP v0.3.8.5 on Windows 7 - may not work on other configurations
